welcome_message_body: Welcome to Kuala Terengganu, where the charm of traditional Malay culture meets the beauty of pristine beaches and crystal-clear waters. We invite you to explore our city and immerse yourself in its rich history and natural wonders. Enjoy your stay!

restaurants.name: 全记鸡饭
restaurants.description: 全记鸡饭 is a chinese restaurant located in Kuala Terengganu.
restaurants.address: No 11-V, Tingkat Bawah, Jalan Kota Lama, 20300 Kuala Terengganu, Terengganu

restaurants.name: Nasi Kukus F1
restaurants.description: Nasi Kukus F1 is a malay restaurant located in Kuala Terengganu.
restaurants.address: Lot 5174, Kampung Banggol Pauh (Jalan Tengku Ampuan Bariah), 21300 Kuala Terengganu, Terengganu

restaurants.name: Gerai Keropok Warisan Losong
restaurants.description: Gerai Keropok Warisan Losong is a asian restaurant located in Kuala Terengganu.
restaurants.address: 74E, Lorong Haji Su, 21000 Kuala Terengganu, Terengganu

restaurants.name: The Vinum Xchange
restaurants.description: The Vinum Xchange is a café located in Kuala Terengganu.

restaurants.name: Domino's Pizza
restaurants.description: Domino's Pizza is a pizzeria located in Kuala Terengganu.
restaurants.address: Jalan Air Jernih, Kuala Terengganu, Terengganu

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Sultan Mahmood Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Satellite Terminal
terminals.description: The satellite terminal at Sultan Mahmood Airport is used for domestic flights only.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport and can be accessed for free after completing a short registration process.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at LTS Pulau Redang Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Wifi is available throughout the airport for free.
